rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment contains a neutral description of experimental setup ('placed in').
The segment reports on study methods.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports action taken without explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes an experimental procedure, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment reports numerical metrics 'three healthy ferrets', 'three of the sick animals' using standard verbs.
